Title: Birdemic: Shock and Terror
Actors: Alan Bagh, Whitney Moore, Tippi Hedren
Plot: In the town of Half Moon Bay California, there's an epidemic on the horizon: a Birdemic. All the birds are attacking humanity for their devastating damage they're inflicting on the Earth: they're going after gas stations and people's cars, and the birds have something the humans will never see coming: Bird-Acid.
